amendment.description: Amendments sought to require that the minimum tenant rent contribution for public housing may not exceed $25 per month.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the amendments printed as amendment Nos. 33 and 34 in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996, to require that the minimum financial hardship rental payment for tenants of public housing units or families receiving federal housing assistance may not exceed $25 per month.

action.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendments (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 297 (Roll no. 157).
